title: Zutto Mae kara Suki deshita.: Kokuhaku Jikkou Iinkai - MOVIE
alternative_title: I've Always Liked You, ずっと前から好きでした。～告白実行委員会～
description: Kokuhaku Jikkou Iinkai: Renai Series (music and animation series featuring seiyuus) created by HoneyWorks getting an animated movie to premiere Spring 2016.
